metadata.title: CVE-2017-11683 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
There is a reachable assertion in the Internal::TiffReader::visitDirectoryfunction in tiffvisitor.cpp of Exiv2 0.26 that will lead to a remote denialof service attack via crafted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
